name: Martin Marinov
university: Student at University of Veliko Tarnovo 'St. St. Cyril and Methodius', majoring in Informatics
aboutMe: I enjoy creating designs – from websites to logos and posters. I develop ASP.NET web applications, striving to combine functionality and aesthetics. I also have an interest in photography and video editing, which complement my overall creative approach.
awardDescription: Award for applicability in a scientific conference of young researchers of the faculty of 'Mathematics and Informatics'. University of Veliko Tarnovo 'St. St. Cyril and Methodius'
upcomingEventDescription: Scientific conference of young researchers of the faculty of 'Mathematics and Informatics'. University of Veliko Tarnovo 'St. St. Cyril and Methodius'
sapphireDescription: Sapphire is a web application designed for users who want to learn effectively through the flashcard method. The application provides an intuitive environment for creating, organizing, and using question-and-answer cards that help you remember information.
mansorDescription: The student notebook Mansor is an innovative web application designed to assist students in their academic and personal development. This application aims to provide a comprehensive solution for effective management of study tasks, personal time, and activities that contribute to holistic student development.
indigoDescription: Indigo is a web application designed to facilitate the publishing process in the scientific community. It provides a platform where users can participate as publishers, authors, or reviewers. Publishers have the ability to create and manage scientific journals, while authors can publish their research in the respective publications. For an article to be published in a journal, a reviewer must have reviewed and approved it.
onyxDescription: Onyx is a web application aimed at users who want to learn the basics of programming through theory, tests, and participation in discussions. The application combines the structure of a learning system with an active user community and up-to-date technological information.
madmathDescription: The MadMath app offers a personalized learning experience through integrated task management features and interactive exercises. MadMath allows students to track their progress and actively engage with the educational material.
mansorReport: The application is included in the scientific journal 'Mathematics, Computer Science and Education' of the University of Veliko Tarnovo 'St. St. Cyril and Methodius', (VOLUME 7, ISSUE 2).
supervisorMilev: аssoc. аssist. prof. dr. Vasil Milev, University of Veliko Tarnovo 'St. St. Cyril and Methodius'
notInJournal: The application has not yet been uploaded to a scientific journal.
madmathReport: The application is included in the scientific journal 'Digital Educational Technologies' of the University of Veliko Tarnovo 'St. St. Cyril and Methodius', (VOLUME 1, ISSUE 2).
supervisorPetrov: аssist. prof. Pavel Petrov, University of Veliko Tarnovo 'St. St. Cyril and Methodius'
supervisorPetrova: Vasilena Petrova, Shumen University 'Bishop Constantine Preslavski'
mentorMateInternship:
Front-end developer intern, Veliko Tarnovo office.
February 2022 - May 2023.
I participated in the development of a web application called VividTracker
vividTrackerDescription: VividTracker allows you to visually track the progress of your projects over time, comparing your results with those of other team members. Advanced features such as tracking the activity of each element with the ability to:
vividLi2: planning events for status change in the future;
vividLi3: requiring action from a specific team member;

downloadReport: You can download the report from the scientific journal.
infinnoJobDescription: A technical writer is responsible for creating clear, accurate, and user-friendly documentation that explains complex information in a way that is understandable to the target audience.
responsibility1Item1: Review of technical specifications, design documentation and prototypes.
responsibility2Item1: Writing and editing user guides, installation guides, API documentation, online help systems.
responsibility2Item2: Creating process documentation for internal teams.
responsibility3Item1: Planning the layout and navigation of the document for ease of use.
responsibility3Item2: Divide information into logical sections using headings, lists, and visualizations.
responsibility4Item1: Creating diagrams, flowcharts, and screenshots to support written content.
responsibility4Item2: Collaborate with graphic designers when necessary.
